Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Botao
Reviews.Content: This item is really very good, and I like it very much! It was really useful for me, thank you!

Reviews.Title: I really like this computer.
Reviews.Author: Rosanne
Reviews.Content: The first computer I received had a display that was defective so I had to return it.  The return process was very easy and Amazon shipped the new one before I even had a chance to ship the one I had back.  Amazon customer service was very helpful.  The only reason I gave the item 4 instead of 5 stars is because of the price. It is an expensive computer but I'm very happy with it.  Great for gaming!
